faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our vehicle export services

q1.question: Which countries do you export to?
q1.answer: We export vehicles to 50+ countries across Africa, Asia, Europe, the Middle East, and the Americas.

q2.question: Are vehicles inspected before export?
q2.answer: Yes, every vehicle undergoes a detailed 120-point inspection with a full report.

q3.question: Do you handle export documents?
q3.answer: Yes, we manage all customs, certificates, and shipping paperwork.

q4.question: How is shipping done?
q4.answer: We arrange secure logistics, container loading, and international freight.

q5.question: Can you source specific car models on request?
q5.answer: Yes, we procure vehicles based on your exact model, budget, and specifications.

q6.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q6.answer: We accept secure international bank transfers and approved global payment methods.

q7.question: How long does the export process take?
q7.answer: Typically 3–8 weeks, depending on vehicle preparation and destination country regulations.

q8.question: Do you export new and used vehicles?
q8.answer: Yes, we export both brand-new and pre-owned vehicles.

q9.question: Do you offer after-sales support?
q9.answer: Yes, our team assists with shipping tracking and export-related support until delivery.

hero.title: Driving Global Automotive Trade
hero.subtitle: Gulf Star Automotive FZC is a licensed premier vehicle export enterprise based in Dubai, UAE. We specialize in global automotive trade, providing seamless logistics and expert documentation.

overview.title: A Leader in Global Vehicle Export
overview.description: Gulf Star Automotive FZC is a specialized vehicle export facilitator, bridging the gap between international buyers and the UAE's premium automotive market. Our core business focuses on high-efficiency procurement, technical inspection, and complex global logistics coordination.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To establish Gulf Star Automotive as the most reliable and efficient vehicle export partner for international buyers, delivering transparent processes, regulatory compliance, and end-to-end logistics solutions.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become the leading automotive export platform connecting Middle East markets with global buyers through technology-driven operations and uncompromising service standards.

leadership.title: Executive
leadership.subtitle: Our management team brings decades of combined experience in international trade, automotive logistics, and export compliance.

global.title: Export
global.subtitle: We facilitate vehicle exports to major markets across six continents with established logistics partnerships and customs expertise.

trust.title: Export
trust.subtitle: Our structured approach ensures regulatory compliance and transparent operations at every stage.

inspection.title: Vehicle Inspection
inspection.desc: 120-point mechanical and cosmetic assessment with detailed reporting.

documentation.title: Export Documentation
documentation.desc: Complete preparation of customs declarations, certificates of origin, and shipping documents.

logistics.title: Logistics Coordination
logistics.desc: Secure transportation, container loading, and international freight management.

compliance.title: Compliance Assurance
compliance.desc: Adherence to destination country import regulations and safety standards.

about.title: About Us - Gulf Star Automotive FZC | International Vehicle Export
about.description: Gulf Star Automotive FZC is a licensed vehicle export company in Dubai, UAE. We provide comprehensive export services including logistics, compliance, and documentation for international automotive trade.
